exceptions.exn: In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> False} t2 : nat t4 : data t0 : nat t3 : data x0 : list instr x1 : instr x2 : list instr x8 : data x4 : nat H3 : (x4 + length x0, x8) ⟬ x1 ⦒ (t0, t3) x5 : list instr x6 : instr x7 : list instr H4 : x4 + length x0 = x4 + length x5 H2 : (x4 + length x0, x8) ⟬ x6 ⦒ (t2, t4) H5 : x0 ++ x1 :: x2 = x5 ++ x6 :: x7 The term "1" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "instr".
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
Found no subterm matching "(x4 + length x0, x8)" in the current goal.

In environment instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> False} t2 : nat t4 : data t0 : nat t3 : data x0 : list instr x1 : instr x2 : list instr x8 : data x4 : nat H3 : (x4 + length x0, x8) ⟬ x1 ⦒ (t0, t3) x5 : list instr x6 : instr x7 : list instr H4 : x4 + length x0 = x4 + length x5 H2 : (x4 + length x0, x8) ⟬ x6 ⦒ (t2, t4) H5 : x0 ++ x1 :: x2 = x5 ++ x6 :: x7 n, m : state Unable to unify "?Goal n = ?Goal m" with "n = m".

original: intros. intros H1 H2. apply sss_fun with (i := 1) in H1. apply sss_fun with (i := 1) in H2. rewrite H1. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
